reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress comfortable and well-made for work, appreciating its soft fabric and flattering style. The fit is nice, with one customer noting it hits right at the ankles, and they consider it perfect for summer dressing. The length receives mixed feedback - while some find it good, others say it's too long. The fabric quality also gets mixed reviews, with some loving the material while others find it cheap and thin. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this dress! Very stretchy!
items.body: I think the dress looks better with a belt on it. I am 5â€™7 & 244 & the XXL fits great but I think I could have fit the XL also as itâ€™s a tad big. Itâ€™s comfortable and stretchy. Length is perfect. ðŸ˜ The color is a very vibrant red/orange. The dress has a little weight to it and doesnâ€™t feel like a cheap material however its thinner in the sense that it might show flaws like if I wore a thong and it was more form fitting it would show cellulite. However I wear shorts underneath to prevent any of that. I love the flow of the dress. I highly recommend it! Read more
items.author: Becca- Honest Vine Voice

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy Dress
items.body: Perfect fit. Can wear casual or depress it up. Looks great with my white denim jacket!! Read more
items.author: Rita Davis

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great on comfort, meh on style
items.body: I loved the color and material (Dark Jade, soft & stretchy). At 5'7", it fit perfectly - right at my ankles. Would have kept it except my BF said I looked "Amish". Needless to say and with all due respect to the Amish, that's not the look I was going for especially given what I was buying the dress for. So I returned it. But 4 stars for quality and comfort! Read more
items.author: LizGM

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Simple Dress
items.body: Love the material. Soft and very comfortable. Seems well made. Read more
items.author: Joe

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this maxi dress!
items.body: This long maxi dress is a great buy. I am 5'-7" and weigh 269 lbs. I bought the sustainable material 4X which fits great and came out of the bag not wrinkled, with no smell and ready to wear. It is slightly loose, very flattering and comfortable. The high waistline and floral pattern hides my buldges nicely. It is very stretchy, but not see through. I can't wait for them to get more patterns and colors in stock in my size. I will definitely be buying more of these easy to wear dresses. Best part is they are versatile and can be used as a comfy lounge dress at home or dressed up with jewelry or a wide elastic fancy buckle belt for work, shopping or dressy wear. I love this dress and highly recommend it. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Super soft but way big

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A fun dress for the occasion

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Sustainably Sourced Rayon Blend Grey Heather Tile Pattern, Sustainably Sourced Rayon Blend Black, Sustainably Sourced Rayon Blend Burgundy, Sustainably Sourced Rayon Blend Charcoal Heather, Sustainably Sourced Rayon Blend Navy, Sustainably Sourced Rayon Blend Red, Sustainably Sourced Rayon Blend Jade Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
